dt-example.title: Button Initialisation
dt-example.info:
This example demonstrates SearchPanes being operated using a [Buttons extension](https://datatables.net/extensions/buttons) button. The panes are not visible on initialisation but when the button is pressed they are displayed on the screen and focused on.
The button and SearchPanes can be configured using the `config` property of the `-button searchPanes` Button. You can see this in action at [this example](buttonsConfig.html). Please note that when initialising SearchPanes with a button any config has to be set as shown in that example.
